channel.title: [HELP] Connecting my client and source to a server
channel.description:
I've downloaded an OceanX Christmas Special source and client from the forums, I followed a tut on youtube and it all went well. I have all the things I believe that I need, however. My client starts up but does not connect to the server when I log in. So I tried to look on my source at the characters, there is a pre-made one. So I used the info, still won't connect.
I made a server with No-IP which is what the tut told me to do, I set it up properly by editing "runserver" and changing the title to my server name. Still not working! Argh!
I would like some help getting my server online so that others can play. For the time being, I don't mind it being on a free zapto.org server. In time I will buy a dedicated vps and host it on that with a decent domain etc.
Any tips would be great, never made a private server, I've only ever made Habbo retros.
Any help would be appreciated, I'm on Skype most of the time so feel free to add me: joyshh
Thanks,

item.title: [HELP] Connecting my client and source to a server
item.dc:creator: @eJoshua eJoshua
item.description:
@eJoshua wrote:

I’ve downloaded an OceanX Christmas Special source and client from the forums, I followed a tut on youtube and it all went well. I have all the things I believe that I need, however. My client starts up but does not connect to the server when I log in. So I tried to look on my source at the characters, there is a pre-made one. So I used the info, still won’t connect.

I made a server with No-IP which is what the tut told me to do, I set it up properly by editing “runserver” and changing the title to my server name. Still not working! Argh!

I would like some help getting my server online so that others can play. For the time being, I don’t mind it being on a free zapto.org server. In time I will buy a dedicated vps and host it on that with a decent domain etc.

Any tips would be great, never made a private server, I’ve only ever made Habbo retros.

Any help would be appreciated, I’m on Skype most of the time so feel free to add me: joyshh

Thanks,
